# SchemaInfo.Ifc2x3SpecialEntityMaps property

Provides a list of IDS entity names that need to be remapped when dealing with IFC2x3 schema. See [`Ifc2x3EntityMappingInformation`](../Ifc2x3EntityMappingInformation.md) for more information on the mapping and its intended use.

```csharp
public static IEnumerable<Ifc2x3EntityMappingInformation> Ifc2x3SpecialEntityMaps { get; }
```
